/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. A small building with a distinctive red roof stands on the right side of the street, its vibrant color contrasting beautifully with the surrounding greenery. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and serene, a typical day in this charming city.
